body: Any update on this functionality? Also please do let me know if you need any help on this functionality. I will be glad to help you out.
Hello, sorry I totally dropped this. Thanks for offering to help, I will take a look this afternoon and comment back.
@valekar If you want to take a stab at it and make a PR, I'd be more than happy :)
@mikkokotila Sure! I will give it a shot.
@sim-san I did not get much time to look at it. So it might take some time to implement this feature. I am still working on it
@valekar let me know if you need any pointing out / advice regarding this.
@mikkokotila Sure! I would let you know if I face any difficulties

Hello, I am (relatively) new to deep learning and am very interested in using Talos for hyperparameter optimization on my keras models. I use fit_generator exclusively due training with very large datasets that will not load into RAM. I am very happy that this issue is getting some attention and that development is in the works. @valekar, I am wishing you the best as you work on this feature and am enthusiastically awaiting updates to this issue.

@mikkokotila,

I had few questions.  

1. In the code, I noticed that there is this “model” folder, with layers.py code, we can create as many 
    number of hidden layers as you want. So do you want me to still keep this functionality?

2. How do you want me to proceed on writing the code for your project? Can I create files or do you 
    want me to add in the existing files?( I see that if I try to modify the existing code, a lot of changes 
    have to be made in the existing code base in order to incorporate this functionality)

@xkrieg Thanks! 

Yes this is a really important functionality that needs to implemented. I will try to finish this as soon as possible. Hopefully :)
